title: Leveraged Bitcoin Futures ETF to Start Trading Tuesday, Sponsor Says
description: Volatility Shares’ 2x Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITX) will become the first leveraged crypto ETF available in the United States after the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) let it go effective on Friday, an executive at the company told CoinDesk.

title: Bitcoin Miner Applied Digital Signs AI Hosting Deal Worth Up to $460M
description: Shares of miner Applied Digital surged on Nasdaq as the firm announced a second AI cloud hosting deal.

title: IMF Capitulates on Bitcoin Bans, Says They're Not Effective
description: The IMF is now suggesting that crypto bans may not be the best move after previously saying that countries should consider it.

title: Yuga Labs Is Writing the Book on CryptoPunks—Literally
description: The history of the CryptoPunks NFT project will get its own physical tome as Yuga and Zak Group tap the community for an official book.

title: FTX files lawsuit to demand compensation from firms linked to its collapse
description: Cryptocurrency exchange FTX has recently lodged a lawsuit in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the District of Delaware against several investment firms with which it had previous ties. The lawsuit, filed on June 22, encompasses 16 counts and aims to recover over $700 million from the defendants. FTX demands $700 million from the defendants ... Read more

title: ChatGPT logins leaked on the dark web after breach
description: In a recent report by Singapore-based cybersecurity firm Group-IB, it was revealed that more than 100,000 login credentials for OpenAI’s ChatGPT artificial intelligence chatbot were leaked on the dark web. The credential theft, which began in June 2022, reached its peak in May 2023 with 26,802 stolen logins. Group-IB identified the Raccoon Infostealer malware as ... Read more

title: Spain grants virtual asset service provider registration to Crypto.com
description: Crypto.com has officially announced the acquisition of its virtual asset service provider (VASP) registration from the Bank of Spain.

title: JP Morgan expands blockchain payment system to include euros
description: JP Morgan, the U.S.-based investment bank, has widened the scope of its blockchain-oriented payment platform, JPM Coin, to include euro-based transactions for corporate customers.

title: Revitalizing Terra: Backbone Labs and Eris Protocol Join Forces to Ignite Growth and Innovation
